name: Kurt's Night Shift
description:
You are Kurt, the night shift security guard at the museum. The alarm on the other side of the building has mysteriously gone off. While investigating you get hindered by the inhabitants of the museum. Trick them and become a master of disguise to figure out what set the alarm off!
